amendment.description: To amend section 2709 of title 18, United States Code, to clarify that the Government may obtain a specified set of electronic communication transactional records under that section, and to make permanent the authority for individual terrorists to be treated as agents of foreign powers under the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978.

action.text: Motion by Senator McConnell to reconsider the vote by which cloture on amendment SA 4787 was not invoked (Record Vote No. 108) entered in Senate.
Cloture on amendment SA 4787 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 38. Record Vote Number: 108.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 4787 presented in Senate.
